Taunton.King Airfield Hangar:
King Airfield Hangar is a historic airplane hangar on Middleboro Avenue in Taunton, Massachusetts near the Taunton Municipal Airport. It is a wood-frame structure, roughly 80 by 80 feet (24 m × 24 m), with a curved corrugated metal roof.
The hangar was built in 1919 as part of "King's Field", one of the first private airports in New England, and is its oldest surviving remnant.
